Interface JsonApi

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractModbusTcpApi, AppManagerImpl, AuthenticatedRequestHandler, AuthenticationRequestHandler, BindingComponentConfigRequestHandler, BindingComponentConfigRequestHandler, BindingComponentConfigRequestHandler, BindingComponentRequestHandler, BindingComponentRequestHandler, BindingComponentRequestHandler, BindingQueryRequestHandler, BindingQueryRequestHandler, BindingRoutesJsonApiHandler, BindingRoutesJsonApiHandler, BindingRoutesJsonApiHandler, BridgeOnewireImpl, ComponentConfigRequestHandler, ComponentManagerImpl, ComponentRequestHandler, ControllerApiModbusTcpReadOnlyImpl, ControllerApiModbusTcpReadWriteImpl, ControllerEssBalancingScheduleImpl, DummyComponentManager, EdgeRequestHandler, EdgeRpcRequestHandler, HostImpl, MeterDiscovergyImpl, QueryRequestHandler, RootRequestHandler, RootRequestHandler, RootRequestHandler, RoutesJsonApiHandler, SimulatorAppImpl, SubscribeChannelsRequestHandler, SubscribeSystemLogJsonApiHandler, SubscribeSystemLogRequestHandler, TimeOfUseTariffControllerImpl
public interface JsonApi
Declares a class as being able to handle JSON-RPC Requests.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    buildJsonApiRoutes(JsonApiBuilder builder)
    Specifies routes of the current component in the given builder.

  • Method Details

    • buildJsonApiRoutes

      void buildJsonApiRoutes(JsonApiBuilder builder)
      Specifies routes of the current component in the given builder.

      Example: 

       @Override
 public void buildJsonApiRoutes(JsonApiBuilder builder) {
     builder.rpc("METHOD_NAME", call -> {
        // handle call...
     });
 }
      Parameters:
      builder - the builder to add the routes
